# PostBox - Jailbreak News. Reimagined. PostBox is more than just a news reader. Create your own articles to share your experiences and recommendations throughout the jailbreak community.

### Create your own story With the support of Markdown, any can effortlessly create custom articles for PostBox. We have streamlined the experience so all the processing will be handled by us.

### Curated packages and themes PostBox provides featured and curated packages sourced from the jailbreak community. The aim is to advertise popular, new, or underrated packages to the jailbreak community.
